div.p: Web Site Quick Start provides links to quickly perform website development and deployment tasks including:

ul.li:
Install development tools that can be used to create a Web Site.
For Web Sites that run on compatible operating systems, a WebMatrix button is available. WebMatrix is a free, lightweight web development tool. The button installs and configures WebMatrix, and then creates a local copy of your Web Site that you can edit and publish back to the web site directory maintained by the Web Site Cloud.
Complete common tasks for publishing a website.
Integrate source control methods that greatly simplify deploying Web Sites.
